hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Aishah that:a man bought a slave and put him to work, then he found some defect in him, so he returned him. He (the seller) said: "O Messenger of Allah he put my slave to work." The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: "A slave's earnings belong to his guarantor

chapter.eng-name: A Slave’s Earning Belong To His Guarantor
